subject: Re: [junit] Debugging a test method with JUnit 3.5 and JBuilder 4.0
msgSnippet: ... Are you running the debug session with -classic in the VM parameters? HotSpot has several bugs in its debugger support. -- Joi Ellis
messageBody:
On Wed, 14 Mar 2001, Michael wrote:

> I found a couple others have this same problem (the debugger doesn't
> stop at the breakpoint) and I haven't found a solution. I tried the -
> noloading option but that didn't make a difference either. Is there
> a solution for this?
>
> MichaÃ«l

Are you running the debug session with -classic in the VM parameters?
HotSpot has several bugs in its debugger support.

--
Joi Ellis Software Engineer
Aravox Technologies joi@..., gyles19@...

No matter what we think of Linux versus FreeBSD, etc., the one thing I
really like about Linux is that it has Microsoft worried. Anything
that kicks a monopoly in the pants has got to be good for something.
- Chris Johnson
